displayProperties.description:
A reward for defeating Ghaul and saving the Last City.

Contains 3 Bright Engrams, a Legendary Ghost Shell, a Legendary jumpship, 10 shaders from the Red War, and 10 Eververse Bounty Notes.

Contains 3 Bright Engrams, a Legendary Ghost Shell, a Legendary jumpship, 10 shaders from the Red War, and 10 Eververse Bounty Notes.

displayProperties.description:
A reward for defeating Panoptes and reuniting the two most powerful Warlocks alive.

Contains a Bright Engram, a Legendary Ghost Shell, a Legendary jumpship, 5 shaders from Curse of Osiris, and 5 Eververse Bounty Notes.
displayProperties.name: The Infinite, Saved

displayProperties.description:
A reward for defeating Panoptes and reuniting the two most powerful Warlocks alive.

Contains a Bright Engram, a Legendary Ghost Shell, a Legendary jumpship, 5 shaders from Curse of Osiris, and 5 Eververse Bounty Notes.
displayProperties.name: The Infinite, Saved

displayProperties.description:
A reward for reviving Rasputin and befriending Ana Bray.

Contains a Bright Engram, a Legendary Ghost Shell, a Legendary Sparrow, 5 shaders from Warmind, and 5 Eververse Bounty Notes.
displayProperties.name: The Warmind, Resurgent

displayProperties.description:
A reward for reviving Rasputin and befriending Ana Bray.

Contains a Bright Engram, a Legendary Ghost Shell, a Legendary Sparrow, 5 shaders from Warmind, and 5 Eververse Bounty Notes.
displayProperties.name: The Warmind, Resurgent

displayProperties.description:
A reward for avenging the death of Cayde.

Contains 3 Bright Engrams, a Legendary Ghost Shell, a Legendary jumpship, 10 shaders from Forsaken, 3 Fireteam Medallions, and 10 Eververse Bounty Notes.
displayProperties.name: The Hunter, Avenged

displayProperties.description:
A reward for avenging the death of Cayde.

Contains 3 Bright Engrams, a Legendary Ghost Shell, a Legendary jumpship, 10 shaders from Forsaken, 3 Fireteam Medallions, and 10 Eververse Bounty Notes.
displayProperties.name: The Hunter, Avenged

displayProperties.description:
A reward for accelerating your journey to the Reef.

Contains any Bright Engrams, Ghost Shells, jumpships, Sparrows, shaders, Fireteam Medallions, and Eververse Bounty Notes not previously claimed from other Eververse rewards.
displayProperties.name: The Guardian, Quickened

displayProperties.description:
A reward for accelerating your journey to the Reef.

Contains any Bright Engrams, Ghost Shells, jumpships, Sparrows, shaders, Fireteam Medallions, and Eververse Bounty Notes not previously claimed from other Eververse rewards.
displayProperties.name: The Guardian, Quickened

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians who seek justice for a fallen friend.

Contains 3 Bright Engrams, 10 Forsaken-themed shaders, and 500 Bright Dust. Limit one per account.
displayProperties.name: Road to Redemption Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians whose aim is always true.

Contains the Author of Devastation ornament, the Corrupt Ether transmat effect, and 3 Bright Engrams. Limit one per account.
displayProperties.name: Master Archer Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians who seek to expand their mind at any cost.

Contains the Cerebral Explosion emote, a Fireteam Medallion, and 10 shaders. Limit one per account.
displayProperties.name: Cerebral Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians who want to honor the history of the Hunter Vanguard.

Contains the Tall Tale jumpship, the Credence weapon ornament, and 10 Forsaken-themed shaders. Limit one per account.
displayProperties.name: Vanguard Dare Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians who consider all their options.

Contains 5 Bright Engrams, 3 Fireteam Medallions, and 10 Forsaken-themed shaders. Limit one per account.
displayProperties.name: Conductive Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians who yearn for the land beyond.

Contains the Freyja Ghost Shell, Upward Spiral jumpship, and Roar Defiant Sparrow—all exclusive to this bundle.
displayProperties.name: Awakened Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians who prefer the simplicity of singles.

Contains 1 Steadfast Engram and 1 random shader.
displayProperties.name: Unary Accolade Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians who believe that good things come in threes.

Contains 3 Steadfast Engrams and 2 random shaders.
displayProperties.name: Ternary Accolade Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians who know when to take five.

Contains 5 Steadfast Engrams and 3 random shaders.
displayProperties.name: Quinary Accolade Bundle

displayProperties.description:
This mask can be upgraded to increase damage to enemies and provide near-invulnerability while airborne. Unlock these upgrades by defeating Terrors in the Haunted Forest.

These perks are active only inside the Haunted Forest. Choosing this upgrade will lock the selected perks on the mask.

tooltipNotifications.displayString:
These trait columns can be enhanced once requirements have been met:

• To upgrade left column traits, Tier 2 weapon enhancements are required.
• To upgrade right column traits, Tier 3 weapon enhancements are required.

displayProperties.description: Each rapid final blow with this weapon progressively increases reload speed substantially for a short time.
displayProperties.name: Feeding Frenzy

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Enhanced traits have greater capabilities than traits found on randomly dropped weapons. Use Ascendant Alloys found in challenging activities to upgrade enhanced traits.

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians to celebrate the Festival of the Lost.

Contains 3 Ephemeral Engrams, 150 Bright Dust, and 5 Dark Fluorescence shaders.
displayProperties.name: Ephemeral Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A one-time bundle for Guardians who understand the need to keep everyone's spirits up.

Contains the exclusive Prankster Dance emote, the Arachnophile transmat effect, and 1 Fireteam Medallion.
displayProperties.name: Misbehaving Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A one-time bundle for Guardians who embody the fighting spirit of kings.

Contains the Prideglass ornament for Fighting Lion, 3 Ephemeral Engrams, and 5 Eververse Bounty Notes.
displayProperties.name: Prideglass Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians whose firepower can always be faster.

Contains the exclusive Hypervelocity ornament for Thunderlord, the Corrupt Ether transmat effect, and 150 Bright Dust.
displayProperties.name: Faster than Speed Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians who know the power in the clouds.

Contains the exclusive Tlāloc's Wrath ornament for Thunderlord, the Reef Oracle transmat effect, and 150 Bright Dust.
displayProperties.name: Sky Deity Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians who don't let the light go out.

Contains 1 Ephemeral Engram and 1 random shader.
displayProperties.name: A Single Flame Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians who've begun to illuminate the dark.

Contains 3 Ephemeral Engrams and 2 random shaders.
displayProperties.name: Three Candles Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians who know how to fill the void.

Contains 5 Ephemeral Engrams and 3 random shaders.
displayProperties.name: Five Glow Bright Bundle

displayProperties.description: This pack contains shaders that remind Guardians of the Festival of the Lost.
displayProperties.name: Spooky Shaders Pack

displayProperties.description: By the time you've seen it, it's already too late.
displayProperties.name: Infected Seeker

displayProperties.description: A reminder of our mortality, streaking through the cosmos.
displayProperties.name: Aerial Shroud

displayProperties.description: When it happens to you, it will change everything.
displayProperties.name: Three to Eight

displayProperties.description: There was no relation to the three other models. It was best for all four.
displayProperties.name: Uncrowned Progenitor

displayProperties.description: It was over before anyone even noticed.
displayProperties.name: The First Domino

displayProperties.description: And again, and again, and again.
displayProperties.name: Stronger Than Now

displayProperties.description: None of it found purchase anywhere, save the ground and sky.
displayProperties.name: Stained Shrapnel

displayProperties.description: He squinted and it was gone… but she swore it never moved.
displayProperties.name: Xenon Direct

displayProperties.description: The strongest Guardians are those who stand together.
displayProperties.name: Fireteam Medallion

displayProperties.description: "I've forgotten so much of my past life, of my family. But when I hold this rifle, everything feels right. I feel like… I'm home." —Ana Bray
displayProperties.name: Polaris Lance

displayProperties.description: Emotes awarded during the Dawning.
displayProperties.name: Emotes

displayProperties.description: Ghost Shells and ships awarded during the Dawning.
displayProperties.name: Ghost Shells and Ships

displayProperties.description: Shaders, transmat effects, and Ghost projections awarded during the Dawning.
displayProperties.name: Shaders and Mods

displayProperties.description: Your favorite weapons will inspire new bonds everywhere when they're customized with these Crimson Days–exclusive ornaments.
displayProperties.name: Weapon Ornaments

displayProperties.description: Show your love for Crimson Days with these exclusive Ghost shells and emotes.
displayProperties.name: Ghosts and Emotes

displayProperties.description: Speed through Crimson Days alongside your Crimson Bond with these exclusive Sparrows.
displayProperties.name: Sparrows

displayProperties.description: These shaders and mods—in the colors of roses, love, and other bonds—capture the spirit of this year's Crimson Days celebrations.
displayProperties.name: Shaders and Mods

displayProperties.description: "Don't fret. It's a simple expedition. We'll be back before lunch." —Sjur Eido, First Queen's Wrath
displayProperties.name: Wish-Ender

displayProperties.description: A thank you for being an early adopter of Destiny 2: Forsaken.
displayProperties.name: Gratitude Package

displayProperties.description:
Extra Confectionary Hearts? Donate them to Lord Shaxx's Crimson Days event for a random reward!

Chance to receive Glimmer, weapons, and gear.
displayProperties.name: Warmhearted Gift

displayProperties.description: For Ghosts who can imagine a greater future.
displayProperties.name: Age of Tomorrow Shell

displayProperties.description: For Ghosts who endure the elements.
displayProperties.name: Lustrous Onyx Shell

displayProperties.description: For Ghosts who sting like a bee.
displayProperties.name: Buzzing Drone Shell

displayProperties.description: For Ghosts who like to have a little more edge.
displayProperties.name: Dark Days Shell

displayProperties.description: For Ghosts who want to explore the aquatic depths.
displayProperties.name: Aqua Tusk Shell

displayProperties.description: For Ghosts who want to spend a little more time on the beach.
displayProperties.name: Brilliant Starfish Shell

displayProperties.description: For Ghosts who flourish in strong winds.
displayProperties.name: Eye of the Storm Shell

displayProperties.description: For Ghosts looking to explore their wild side.
displayProperties.name: Chrome Crab Shell

displayProperties.description: For Ghosts who want to reach maximum velocity.
displayProperties.name: Aero Dart Shell

displayProperties.description: For Ghosts who stay true.
displayProperties.name: Path Followed Shell

displayProperties.description: For Ghosts who like to look stylishly aerodynamic.
displayProperties.name: Techno Robin Shell

displayProperties.description: For Ghosts with a special spark.
displayProperties.name: Valor Chevron Shell

displayProperties.description: For Ghosts who like the classics—with a twist.
displayProperties.name: Classic Waveform Shell

displayProperties.description: For Ghosts who want to be heard.
displayProperties.name: Audiophile Shell

displayProperties.description: For Ghosts who love cool weather.
displayProperties.name: Autumn Gloss Shell

displayProperties.description: For Ghosts who want to be consulted.
displayProperties.name: Eight Ball Shell

displayProperties.description: For Ghosts who know the way home.
displayProperties.name: True North Shell

displayProperties.description: For Ghosts who never shy away from a (snowball) fight.
displayProperties.name: Hard-Packed Shell

displayProperties.description: For Ghosts who are never obsolete.
displayProperties.name: Ufsilon's Rune Shell

displayProperties.description: For Ghosts with a sharp tongue.
displayProperties.name: Amethyst Spine Shell

displayProperties.description: For Ghosts of warrior pedigree.
displayProperties.name: Kabuto Shell

displayProperties.description: For Ghosts who brave the center of the storm.
displayProperties.name: Maelstrom's Auge Shell

displayProperties.description: For Ghosts who keep the secrets of eternity.
displayProperties.name: Sibyl Shell

displayProperties.description: For Ghosts who endure the harshest winters.
displayProperties.name: Frozen Amaryllis Shell

displayProperties.description: For Ghosts not bound to a single plane of existence.
displayProperties.name: Transhedron Shell

displayProperties.description: For Ghosts thrice valiant.
displayProperties.name: Ternion Honor Shell

displayProperties.description: For Ghosts who live on the horizon.
displayProperties.name: Sunseeker Shell

displayProperties.description: Boosting while riding Dawning Cheer will occasionally spawn a Glimmer present until the boost ends. This perk is available only during the Dawning.
displayProperties.name: Happy Dawning

displayProperties.description: Landing a trick while riding Dawning Cheer will spawn multiple Glimmer presents. This perk is available only during the Dawning.
displayProperties.name: Dawning Dare

displayProperties.description: Increased transmat speed.
displayProperties.name: Transmat Preloader

displayProperties.description: Enemies are less aggressive toward you while you are riding this Sparrow.
displayProperties.name: Stealth Running

displayProperties.description: Hold down the trigger to charge up a tracking shot that explodes and burns on impact.
displayProperties.name: Charge Shot

displayProperties.description: Grenades stick to surfaces and chain Arc bolts to other mines.
displayProperties.name: Arc Traps

displayProperties.description: This weapon fires full auto. Hip-fire shots deal bonus precision damage while increasing reload speed and accuracy.
displayProperties.name: Fan Fire

displayProperties.description: [Alternate Weapon Action]  : Consume the magazine and load a round with additional range and damage.
displayProperties.name: Honed Edge

displayProperties.description: Arrows fired quickly after a full draw become poison arrows. Precision hits with poison arrows stun the combatant and spread poison to nearby ones. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.
displayProperties.name: Poison Arrows

displayProperties.description:
This weapon is optimized for an especially explosive payload.
  •  Greatly increases blast radius
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
  •  Slightly decreases projectile speed
displayProperties.name: Volatile Launch

displayProperties.description:
Agile sight. Short zoom.
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases range
displayProperties.name: Rasmussen ISA

displayProperties.description:
Lightweight sight. Short zoom.
  •  Increases handling speed
  •  Increases range
displayProperties.name: Meyrin RDS

displayProperties.description:
Superior scope. Medium zoom. Highlights enemy targets.
  •  Increases range
displayProperties.name: Meyrin RDL

displayProperties.description:
Far scope. Long zoom. Highlights enemy targets.
  •  Increases range
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
displayProperties.name: Satou Focus Lens

displayProperties.description:
Precision scope. Long zoom.
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed
displayProperties.name: Satou Precision Lens

displayProperties.description: Final blows grant a stacking bonus to airborne effectiveness. Final blows while airborne grant increased stacks.
displayProperties.name: Air Assault

tooltipNotifications.displayString:
These trait columns can be enhanced once requirements have been met:

• To upgrade left column traits, Tier 2 weapon enhancements are required.
• To upgrade right column traits, Tier 3 weapon enhancements are required.

displayProperties.description: Final blows grant an improved stacking bonus to airborne effectiveness. Final blows while airborne grant increased stacks.
displayProperties.name: Air Assault

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Enhanced traits have greater capabilities than traits found on randomly dropped weapons. Use Ascendant Alloys found in challenging activities to upgrade enhanced traits.

displayProperties.description: Breaking an enemy's shield with this weapon makes them more vulnerable to Kinetic damage for a brief period.
displayProperties.name: Disruption Break

tooltipNotifications.displayString:
These trait columns can be enhanced once requirements have been met:

• To upgrade left column traits, Tier 2 weapon enhancements are required.
• To upgrade right column traits, Tier 3 weapon enhancements are required.

displayProperties.description: Breaking a combatant's shield with this weapon makes them more vulnerable to Kinetic damage for an improved duration.
displayProperties.name: Disruption Break

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Enhanced traits have greater capabilities than traits found on randomly dropped weapons. Use Ascendant Alloys found in challenging activities to upgrade enhanced traits.

displayProperties.description: This weapon fires in a straight line and has a massively increased projectile speed.
displayProperties.name: Micro-Missile

displayProperties.description: Missing a shot has a chance to return ammo directly to the magazine.
displayProperties.name: Mulligan

tooltipNotifications.displayString:
These trait columns can be enhanced once requirements have been met:

• To upgrade right column traits, Tier 3 weapon enhancements are required.

displayProperties.description: Missing a shot has an improved chance to return ammo directly to the magazine.
displayProperties.name: Mulligan

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Enhanced traits have greater capabilities than traits found on randomly dropped weapons. Use Ascendant Alloys found in challenging activities to upgrade enhanced traits.

displayProperties.description: Energy matched shield explosion disorients nearby combatants.
displayProperties.name: Shield Disorient

displayProperties.description: This weapon gains bonus damage when three or more enemies are in close proximity.
displayProperties.name: Surrounded

tooltipNotifications.displayString:
These trait columns can be enhanced once requirements have been met:

• To upgrade left column traits, Tier 2 weapon enhancements are required.
• To upgrade right column traits, Tier 3 weapon enhancements are required.

displayProperties.description: This weapon gains improved bonus damage when three or more targets are in close proximity.
displayProperties.name: Surrounded

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Enhanced traits have greater capabilities than traits found on randomly dropped weapons. Use Ascendant Alloys found in challenging activities to upgrade enhanced traits.

displayProperties.description: After a successful melee hit, this weapon gains increased damage, handling, and reload speed for a short duration—or until three shots are fired.
displayProperties.name: Trench Barrel

tooltipNotifications.displayString:
These trait columns can be enhanced once requirements have been met:

• To upgrade left column traits, Tier 2 weapon enhancements are required.
• To upgrade right column traits, Tier 3 weapon enhancements are required.

displayProperties.description: After a successful melee hit, this weapon gains increased damage, improved handling, and improved reload speed for a short duration—or until three shots are fired.
displayProperties.name: Trench Barrel

tooltipNotifications.displayString: Enhanced traits have greater capabilities than traits found on randomly dropped weapons. Use Ascendant Alloys found in challenging activities to upgrade enhanced traits.

displayProperties.description:
A one-time bundle to kick off the Season of the Forge.

Contains 5 Bright Engrams, 3 Fireteam Medallions, and 250 Bright Dust.
displayProperties.name: Forge's Ignition Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians who welcome the past's return.

Contains the exclusive Dark Horse Sparrow, 2 Bright Engrams, and 10 shaders from the Season of the Forge.
displayProperties.name: Curator's Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A one-time bundle to welcome the Iron Banner's return.

Contains three Ghost projections exclusive to this bundle, 1 Fireteam Medallion, and 2 Gleaming Boons of the Crucible.
displayProperties.name: Visions of Iron Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A one-time bundle for true friends of Cayde-6.

Contains the Salute to the Colonel ornament for Ace of Spades, 3 Bright Engrams, and the Only the Finest transmat effect.
displayProperties.name: Feathered Friend Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A one-time bundle for Guardians who welcome the Black Armory's return.

Contains 5 Bright Engrams, 3 Fireteam Medallions, and 10 Lilac Bombast shaders.
displayProperties.name: Forges Burn Bright Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A one-time bundle for Guardians who believe in elegance amidst brutality.

Contains the Suros Chrome ornament for Suros Regime, 3 Bright Engrams, and the Past Unearthed transmat effect.
displayProperties.name: Form Given Function Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A one-time bundle to celebrate the return of the Dawning.

Contains 5 Winterdrift Engrams, the Glad Tidings jumpship, the Dawning Ghost projection, and 250 Bright Dust.
displayProperties.name: Dawning's Genesis Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A one-time bundle for Guardians who want to bake it to the limit.

Contains the exclusive Baking Cookies emote, the Shower of Gifts transmat effect, and 1 Fireteam Medallion.
displayProperties.name: Mixing It Up Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians who wish the Dawning would never end.

Contains 3 Winterdrift Engrams, 5 Aniline Shock shaders, and 1 Gleaming Boon of the Vanguard.
displayProperties.name: Dawning's Delight Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A one-time bundle for Guardians who want to spread the love.

Contains the exclusive Tiny Bow emote, shaders, and a Fireteam Medallion.
displayProperties.name: Lovestruck Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A one-time bundle for Guardians who want to look their best for their Crimson Bond.

Contains an exclusive Legendary ornament and Fireteam Medallions.
displayProperties.name: Dressed to Thrill Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians who prefer a minimalist touch.

Contains 1 Bright Engram and 1 random shader.
displayProperties.name: Once Etched Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians who prize efficiency.

Contains 3 Bright Engrams and 2 random shaders.
displayProperties.name: Thrice Etched Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians who know the merits of excess.

Contains 5 Bright Engrams and 3 random shaders.
displayProperties.name: Five Etchings Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians who sing the first note.

Contains 1 Bright Engram and 1 random shader.
displayProperties.name: First Snowflake Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians who love three-part harmonies.

Contains 3 Bright Engrams and 2 random shaders.
displayProperties.name: Wizened Three Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians who remember even the fifth verse.

Contains 5 Bright Engrams and 3 random shaders.
displayProperties.name: Five Golden Rings Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians to bond over.

Contains 1 Bright Engram and 1 random shader.
displayProperties.name: Loneliest Number Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians committed to their Bond.

Contains 3 Bright Engrams and 2 random shaders.
displayProperties.name: Three's a Crowd Bundle

displayProperties.description:
A bundle for Guardians with a powerful Bond.

Contains 5 Bright Engrams and 3 random shaders.
displayProperties.name: Five's a Party Bundle

displayProperties.description: An engram containing different customization options, including Eververse Bounty Notes. Return it to Tess Everis in the Tower Courtyard to reveal its contents.
displayProperties.name: Etched Engram

displayProperties.description: An engram containing different customization options, including Eververse Bounty Notes. Return it to Tess Everis in the Tower Courtyard to reveal its contents.
displayProperties.name: Etched Engram
